featured.text: In the future when the population grows, there will be no need for the recording because the howler monkeys will have more reason to check in with the neighbors to define their own territories.
As for our neighbors, they liked to invite my father to dinner so that they could tell him stories about their children, parents, friends, and pets.

Additionally, by having branches that do not touch those of their neighbors, trees may be able to limit the spread of leaf-eating insects, and potentially also the transmission of diseases from tree to tree.
large enough to prevent them from touching their neighbors.

definition.zh_def: 鄰居；住在附近的人或物。
definition.en_def: A person living near or next door to the speaker or person referred to.
definition.example: My neighbor often helps me with my garden.
